title: Welcome to the Hellmouth
plot: When teen vampire slayer Buffy tries to start a new life at Sunnydale High, she discovers that the school sits atop a demonic dimensional portal.

title: The Harvest
plot: Buffy and her friends encounter a powerful vampire bent on opening a portal to a dimension inhabited by demons.

title: Witch
plot: Buffy suspects she has a witch on her hands when the cheerleading squad falls victim to sudden blindness and spontaneous combustion.

title: Teacher's Pet
plot: Buffy's biology teacher is killed by a giant praying mantis that assumes the form of a beautiful substitute teacher.

title: Never Kill a Boy on the First Date
plot: With Buffy preoccupied by her date with Owen, Giles is trapped by a group of vampires seeking to raise a powerful leader.

title: The Pack
plot: Xander and several other students are possessed by the spirit of a demonic breed of hyenas that wreak havoc at the high school

title: Angel
plot: Buffy discovers Angel's dark secret and hesitates to do anything about it, which could spell danger for someone she loves.

title: I, Robot... You, Jane
plot: Willow's new Internet chat buddy turns out to be a powerful demon electronically unleashed from a centuries-old, newly digitized book.

title: The Puppet Show
plot: Buffy suspects that a ventriloquist's dummy may be harvesting organs from classmates performing in a talent show.

title: Nightmares
plot: A series of strange occurrences lead Buffy and her friends to discover that their worst nightmares have literally become reality.

title: Out of Mind, Out of Sight
plot: When an invisible menace starts attacking students and faculty at Sunnydale High, the Scooby Gang traces the problem back to Cordelia.

title: Prophecy Girl
plot: Giles discovers an ancient book foretelling Buffy's death at the hands of the Master.

title: When She Was Bad
plot: Buffy returns from summer vacation sporting an attitude and suffers from recurring nightmares involving the Master. Meanwhile, the Anointed One and his followers plot their revenge.

title: Some Assembly Required
plot: Two science club nerds use body parts to create the "perfect girlfriend" for a teenager who has been brought back from the dead.

title: School Hard
plot: Buffy's mother and friends become trapped inside Sunnydale High School when a vampire named Spike launches an attack against the Slayer on Parent-Teacher night.

title: Inca Mummy Girl
plot: An Incan Princess mummy is reanimated in Sunnydale where she sucks the life force from others in order to stay alive.

title: Reptile Boy
plot: Buffy and Cordelia attend a frat party where they are offered as human sacrifices to a reptile-like creature.

title: Halloween
plot: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends patronize an unusual costume shop where customers turn into whatever costume they are wearing.

title: Lie to Me
plot: Buffy is lured into a trap by a group of undead wannabes who hope that Spike will make them vampires in exchange for giving him the Slayer.

title: The Dark Age
plot: Giles' past comes back to haunt him as a demon he and Ethan Rayne summoned in their wild youth seeks them out in Sunnydale.

title: What's My Line?: Part 1
plot: Spike brings in three professional bounty hunters to eliminate Buffy while she ponders on what her profession might be if her fate wasn't already sealed.

title: What's My Line?: Part 2
plot: Buffy joins forces with another Slayer in hopes of saving Angel from the clutches of Spike and Drusilla.

title: Ted
plot: Buffy's mom introduces her new boyfriend, who charms everyone except Buffy. When she confronts his dark side, she is left questioning her actions.

title: Bad Eggs
plot: Buffy and her friends encounter even more trouble than expected when the eggs they are given in health class turn out to be prehistoric parasites that take over their lives.

title: Surprise
plot: To give Buffy a surprise on her 17th birthday, Drusilla and Spike bring together the body parts of a dismembered demon who cannot be killed.

title: Innocence
plot: Buffy and her friends battle the Judge and face unexpected danger from Angel, who has lost his soul after experiencing a moment of true happiness.

title: Phases
plot: Buffy and her friends discover secrets about themselves as they battle a werewolf, its hunter, and their own emotions.

title: Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered
plot: As Valentine's Day approaches, Xander tries to improve his love life through witchcraft and finds himself with too much of a good thing.

title: Passion
plot: Angel steps up his torment of Buffy and her friends as Jenny searches for a way to restore his soul.

title: Killed by Death
plot: While hospitalized with a severe case of the flu, Buffy battles a demon that sucks the life out of sick children.

title: I Only Have Eyes for You
plot: Sunnydale High School is haunted by the ghosts of a former student and teacher who reenact their tragic romance through the bodies of the school's current inhabitants.

title: Go Fish
plot: Members of the Sunnydale swim team are killed by a gill monster of unknown origins.

title: Becoming: Part 1
plot: Angel plots to revive an ancient demon bent of sweeping everything on earth into hell itself.

title: Becoming: Part 2
plot: Spike strikes an unlikely alliance with Buffy to keep Angel from destroying the world.

title: Anne
plot: Buffy -- living on her own in a big city -- assists a girl whose boyfriend has mysteriously vanished. Back in Sunnydale, Buffy's friends do their best to battle the forces of evil.

title: Dead Man's Party
plot: A Nigerian mask reanimates the dead, forcing Buffy to battle a horde of zombies.

title: Faith, Hope & Trick
plot: A charismatic Slayer visits Sunnydale and wins over many of Buffy's friends. Meanwhile, two powerful vampires plot an attack.

title: Beauty and the Beasts
plot: Oz becomes the prime suspect when a series of animal-like attacks occur in Sunnydale.

title: Homecoming
plot: As Buffy and Cordelia vie for Homecoming Queen, a group of killers gather to participate in SlayerFest '98.

title: Band Candy
plot: Adults throughout Sunnydale behave like immature teenagers after they eat cursed candy.

title: Revelations
plot: With some help from Faith's new watcher, Buffy seeks to destroy a weapon-like glove before it falls into the hands of a demon.

title: Lovers Walk
plot: Spike returns to Sunnydale and kidnaps Willow in hopes of creating a magic spell that will make Drusilla love him again.

title: The Wish
plot: Cordelia's wish for a Buffy-free Sunnydale comes true, plunging her into a world where vampires have control of the town.

title: Amends
plot: As the Christmas holiday approaches, Angel is tormented by evil apparitions who want him to eliminate Buffy.

title: Gingerbread
plot: After discovering the corpses of two young children bearing a symbol linked to the occult, Joyce spearheads a campaign to rid Sunnydale of witches.

title: Helpless
plot: As her birthday approaches, Buffy loses her slayer powers and must do battle with a vampire who is not only extremely powerful but also quite mad.

title: The Zeppo
plot: Xander experiences an adventure of his own when he encounters a group of reanimated corpses out to construct a bomb. Meanwhile, Buffy and her friends battle the forces of evil when the Hellmouth reopens.

title: Bad Girls
plot: Faith convinces Buffy to live on the wild side, with fatal consequences.

title: Consequences
plot: A homicide detective closes in on Buffy and Faith as he investigates the deputy mayor's death.

title: Doppelgangland
plot: While casting a magic spell, Anya and Willow accidentally summon Willow's evil double from an alternate universe.

title: Enemies
plot: As Faith attempts to seduce Angel and steal his soul, the Mayor summons a dark-magic demon to finish the job.

title: Choices
plot: The Mayor takes Willow prisoner after Buffy and her friends steal away a box containing demonic energy needed for Ascension Day.

title: The Prom
plot: After Angel breaks off their relationship, Buffy single-handedly battles three fearsome hell hounds so that her classmates can enjoy their senior prom.

title: Graduation Day: Part 1
plot: In an effort to distract Buffy from the Ascension, the mayor instructs Faith to poison Angel.

title: Graduation Day: Part 2
plot: On Ascension Day, Buffy and her friends prepare for the ultimate battle as they face off against the mayor and a horde of vampires.

title: Earshot
plot: A mouthless demon infects Buffy with the ability to hear everyone's thoughts, but what starts out as a useful power soon turns into a curse.

title: City of...
plot: Angel relocates to Los Angeles, where he encounters a stranger who experiences visions of those in need, and a woman who lives in fear of a vampire.

title: The Freshman
plot: Buffy feels like a fish out of water in her first year at college, but the mysterious disappearance of a fellow student puts her back in her element.

title: Lonely Heart
plot: Angel tracks a wormlike demon that preys on lonely hearts at a trendy nightclub.

title: Living Conditions
plot: Buffy finds herself at odds with her new roommate and is troubled by a series of disturbing dreams involving a soul-sucking demon.

title: In the Dark
plot: Spike and a colleague torture Angel in hopes of ascertaining the whereabouts of a ring that makes the wearer invincible.

title: The Harsh Light of Day
plot: As Buffy gets to know a charming student named Parker, Spike searches for a ring that, according to legend, makes the wearer invincible.

title: I Fall to Pieces
plot: Angel aids a woman being stalked by a deranged surgeon who is literally coming apart.

title: Fear Itself
plot: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends find themselves trapped inside a haunted frat house complete with real bats, zombies, and a terrifying demon.

title: Rm w/a Vu
plot: Cordelia falls in love with a rent-controlled apartment that turns out to be haunted, and a demon comes to collect on Doyle's loans.

title: Beer Bad
plot: Xander finds employment as a bartender at a pub where some of Buffy's friends turn into terrifying Cro-Magnon creatures.

title: Sense and Sensitivity
plot: An imprisoned criminal uses his connections to target Kate for elimination.

title: Wild at Heart
plot: When Oz falls hard for a sexy singer who also happens to be a werewolf, he must choose between Willow and his own animal instincts.

title: The Bachelor Party
plot: Doyle receives a surprise visit from his wife, who wishes to end their marriage so that she may wed a demon.

title: The Initiative
plot: Spike finds himself targeted by a group of commandos after he escapes from a military lab underneath the Sunnydale campus.

title: I Will Remember You
plot: Angel must make a difficult decision regarding Buffy when a demon's blood makes him mortal once more.

title: Pangs
plot: On Thanksgiving, Buffy encounters the spirit of a Native American warrior whose people were wiped out by settlers.

title: Hero
plot: Doyle, Angel and Cordelia assist a clan of mixed-heritage demons targeted for extermination by a group of demons known as The Scourge.

title: Something Blue
plot: One of Willow's spells causes her statements to become reality, with consequences both entertaining and life-threatening.

title: Parting Gifts
plot: Wesley joins Angel and Cordelia as he pursues a demon that mutilates creatures possessing supernatural powers.

title: Hush
plot: When everyone in Sunnydale loses their voice, the Scooby Gang must silently solve the mystery of the monsters who stole their ability to speak.

title: Somnambulist
plot: Angel attempts to assist Kate with a murder investigation after discovering that a proteg√® from his past is responsible for a series of killing.

title: Doomed
plot: While attempting to redefine her relationship with Riley, Buffy must also stop demons that are determined to reopen the Hellmouth.

title: Expecting
plot: Angel and Wesley search for answers when Cordelia wakes up eight and a half months pregnant.

title: A New Man
plot: Ethan Rayne returns to town and transforms Giles into a demon. Spike is the only one who can help.

title: She
plot: Angel finds himself caught in the middle of a war between the sexes when a female demon from another dimension fights against her male oppressors.

title: The I in Team
plot: Buffy teams with Riley after she is allowed access to the Initiative; Spike is targeted by commandos.

title: I've Got You Under My Skin
plot: Angel and Wesley perform an exorcism on a young boy possessed by a demon.

title: Goodbye Iowa
plot: Tension erupts between Buffy and an ailing Riley as they pursue Professor Maggie Walsh's killer.

title: The Prodigal
plot: Angel seeks to solve a mystery involving Kate's father after a normally peaceful demon attacks a delivery man on the subway.

title: This Year's Girl
plot: Faith awakens from her coma and seeks revenge against Buffy.

title: The Ring
plot: Owners of an underground arena enslave Angel and pit him against powerful demons for entertainment.

title: Who Are You?
plot: Having switched bodies with Buffy, Faith enjoys freedom. Meanwhile, Buffy finds herself at the mercy of the Watcher's Council.

title: Eternity
plot: A television actress whose career is in a slump tries to preserve her youthful appearance by becoming one of the undead.

title: Superstar
plot: Buffy senses that something is amiss when Jonathan becomes a hero to everyone in Sunnydale.

title: Five by Five
plot: Fed up with Angel meddling in their affairs, Wolfram and Hart hire newly arrived Faith to take him out.

title: Where the Wild Things Are
plot: Buffy and Riley's passionate lovemaking energizes supernatural elements inside a frat house.

title: Sanctuary
plot: Angel attempts to reform Faith as Kate, the Watchers Council, and even Buffy Summers pursue her.

title: New Moon Rising
plot: Oz's return to Sunnydale leads to his incarceration by the Initiative and complicates the relationship between Willow and Tara.

title: War Zone
plot: As Angel helps a nerdy billionaire retrieve some compromising photos, he encounters a group of street kids defending against an invasion of vampires.

title: The Yoko Factor
plot: After joining forces with Adam, Spike drives a wedge between Buffy and her friends. Meanwhile, Angel's return to Sunnydale leads to a violent confrontation with Riley.

title: Blind Date
plot: A renegade attorney from Wolfram and Hart joins forces with Angel to stop a blind assassin from killing three children who threaten the firm.

title: Primeval
plot: Having gained control of Riley's mind, Adam sets in motion his plot to create an army of unstoppable soldiers and destroy the Initiative.

title: To Shanshu in L.A.
plot: A scythe-wielding demon targets Angel's allies as Wolfram and Hart lawyers attempt to summon a powerful force from beyond.

title: Restless
plot: Buffy, Willow, Xander, and Giles experience dreams in which they are pursued by a mysterious figure.

title: Judgment
plot: Misinterpreting one of Cordy's visions, Angel tries to help a pregnant woman and accidentally kills her demon protector. Now, Angel must fulfill the dead warrior's mission and fight a battle to save the woman's unborn baby. When the woman runs off though, Angel is forced to make an incredible sacrifice to find her again... He has to sing at a karaoke bar.

title: Buffy vs. Dracula
plot: The one-and-only Dracula makes his way to Sunnydale and immediately has everyone enchanted. Even Buffy might not be able to resist his charms.

title: Are You Now or Have You Ever Been
plot: In the 1950s, Angel aids a woman hiding from her past in a hotel with a long history of death and mayhem. In the present, Angel hunts a demon.

title: Real Me
plot: As Harmony and her vampire gang plot Buffy's demise, Dawn adjusts to life with a Slayer.

title: First Impressions
plot: Angel encounters an amorous Darla in his dreams; Cordelia vows to protect Gunn after she experiences a vision of him in mortal danger.

title: The Replacement
plot: When a demon creates a Xander double, the real Xander must convince his friends of his true identity.

title: Untouched
plot: Angel attempts to help a girl with telekinetic powers before she falls into the hands of Wolfram and Hart.

title: Out of My Mind
plot: While Riley's health begins to deteriorate, Spike and Harmony force a surgeon to remove the behavior modification chip embedded in Spike's brain.

title: Dear Boy
plot: Darla tries to drive Angel over the edge in hopes of getting him to embrace his dark side.

title: No Place Like Home
plot: Buffy learns more about Dawn after she discovers a mysterious orb linked to a group of monks being pursued by an incredibly powerful force.

title: Guise Will Be Guise
plot: Angel meets with a swami to end his obsession with Darla. Meanwhile, Wesley assumes Angel's identity and plays bodyguard to a businessman's daughter.

title: Family
plot: When relatives arrive in Sunnydale, to celebrate her birthday, Tara uses a magic spell on her friends to keep them from learning her "secret." Meanwhile, Glory unleashes a hoard of demons to hunt down Buffy.

title: Darla
plot: Lindsey finds himself drawn to Darla as her mental state deteriorates.

title: Fool for Love
plot: After being bested in a fight by an ordinary vampire, Buffy asks Spike to explain how he killed two Slayers many years earlier.

title: The Shroud of Rahmon
plot: Posing as a hip Vegas vampire, Angel infiltrates a gang of thieves bent on stealing a supernatural shroud housed in a museum vault.

title: Shadow
plot: Glory transforms a snake into a terrifying monster in her quest to find the Key; Joyce is hospitalized after being diagnosed with an illness.

title: The Trial
plot: In an attempt to save Darla's life, Angel must undergo three separate challenges that no one has ever survived.

title: Listening to Fear
plot: As Joyce's sickness makes her begin doing odd things, a demon emerges from a meteorite and begins killing the mentally ill.

title: Reunion
plot: Angel fights to stop Darla and Drusilla as they embark on a murderous rampage across the city.

title: Into the Woods
plot: After Buffy catches Riley in the clutches of a vampire-junkie, Riley makes an important decision regarding their relationship.

title: Triangle
plot: While Giles is in England meeting with the Watcher Council, a bickering Anya and Willow mind the magic store and inadvertently conjure up a fearsome troll.

title: Redefinition
plot: After firing Cordelia, Gunn and Wesley, Angel trains for a showdown with Darla and Drusilla while the others decide what to do with their lives.

title: Blood Money
plot: Wolfram and Hart are sponsoring a fund raising benefit for a local teen shelter. Angel is suspicious of their motives and starts investigating. Meanwhile, Wes, Gunn and Cordy work to establish their own detective business.

title: Checkpoint
plot: The Watcher Council travels to Sunnydale to review Buffy's skills as a Slayer; meanwhile, Glory puts her search for the Key into high gear.

title: Happy Anniversary
plot: Angel tries to stop a lovelorn physicist from stopping time forever.

title: Blood Ties
plot: When Dawn learns her true identity, she runs away - only to encounter Glory.

title: The Thin Dead Line
plot: Angel, Gunn and Wesley battle zombie police officers who have been stalking street kids.

title: Crush
plot: Buffy learns that Spike has a crush on her - a situation made all the more dangerous by Drusilla's return to Sunnydale.

title: Reprise
plot: On the eve of a 75-year review at Wolfram and Hart, Angel seeks a magic ring that will take him to hell to look for the firm's "senior partners."

title: I Was Made to Love You
plot: Buffy and her friends encounter an incredibly strong female robot with only one thing on its mind - love.

title: Epiphany
plot: Angel has an epiphany which has him questioning his actions over the past few months. Meanwhile, the three eyed demon clan is after Gunn, Wes and Cordy. It's up to Angel to save them... If they can all start trusting him again.

title: The Body
plot: Buffy, Dawn, and their friends deal with the aftermath of Joyce's death.

title: Disharmony
plot: Angel and his friends fight a new vampire running a motivational pyramid scheme. And Cordelia helps her old friend Harmony, who's now a vampire.

title: Forever
plot: With some help from Spike, Dawn attempts to bring Joyce back from the dead.

title: Dead End
plot: Wolfram and Hart arranges for Lindsey to get a new hand, but when it turns out to be evil, Angel investigates the firm's source of body parts.

title: Intervention
plot: A weary Buffy seeks to regain focus by embarking on a quest with the First Slayer; Spike cavorts with his very own "Buffybot" and Glory instructs her minions to spy on Buffy's friends in the hopes of ascertaining the Key's true identity.

title: Belonging
plot: A magic portal from another world brings a nasty demon--and the Host's cousin--to Los Angeles.

title: Tough Love
plot: When Tara falls victim to Glory's incredible power, Willow embraces dark magic and launches a counterattack.

title: Over the Rainbow
plot: Angel and his friends travel to the Host's home world to look for Cordelia.

title: Spiral
plot: Realizing they may never be able to vanquish Glory, Buffy and the gang decide to flee Sunnydale in Spike's R.V. to protect Dawn.

title: Through the Looking Glass
plot: Cordelia meets the Groosalugg while Wesley, Gunn and Angel get a good look at the beast that lives within Angel.

title: The Weight of the World
plot: When Buffy lapses into a catatonic state, Willow uses magic to find out why; a tug-of-war erupts between Glory and Ben over Dawn's ultimate fate.

title: There's No Place Like Plrtz Glrb
plot: Wesley and Gunn storm the Pylean castle while Angel fights the Groosalugg

title: The Gift
plot: As Glory prepares Dawn for a bloodletting ritual that will open a portal to another dimension, Buffy and her friends prepare for battle.

title: Heartthrob
plot: As Angel mourns Buffy's death, he battles a lovelorn vampire seeking revenge for the death of his beloved, who was killed by Angel.

title: That Vision Thing
plot: Lilah coerces Angel to help her secure the release of a prisoner the Powers That Be have locked in a fiery prison.

title: Bargaining: Part 1
plot: The gang hope to bring Buffy back from the dead. Meanwhile, motorcycle-riding demons discover the Buffybot has been posing as the Slayer.

title: Bargaining: Part 2
plot: As the Hellions continue to ravage Sunnydale, a feral Buffy claws her way out of her own grave and must come to the aid of her friends.

title: That Old Gang of Mine
plot: Gunn's loyalties are torn between his current demon-hunting associates and his old gang, which now kills demons for fun instead of defense.

title: After Life
plot: Buffy and her friends battle a demon that may have hitched a ride with Buffy as she crossed into the world from another dimension.

title: Carpe Noctem
plot: An old man uses an ancient incantation to switch bodies with Angel.

title: Flooded
plot: While trying to get a loan, Buffy runs afoul of three deadbeat sorcerers who are using the otherworldly powers of a demon to rob a bank.

title: Fredless
plot: Fred prepares to go home to her parents--until she earns a place with the group by figuring out the key to an attack launched by large bug demons.

title: Life Serial
plot: Buffy's powers are tested by Andrew, Jonathan and Warren, who seek to expose and exploit her weaknesses in an effort to destroy her.

title: Billy
plot: Angel's friends are affected by a man with the power to make other men brutalize women.

title: All the Way
plot: Dawn discovers her crush has a deadly secret. Xander announces his engagement to Anya, and Tara worries about Willow's reliance on magic.

title: Offspring
plot: Darla returns to reveal that she's pregnant with Angel's child.

title: Once More, with Feeling
plot: In this musical extravaganza, Sunnydale residents find themselves bursting into song, and flame, when a demon attempts to make Dawn his bride.

title: Quickening
plot: As Angel tries to determine what kind of baby Darla will have, Holtz searches for Angel, and Lilah and Nathan send out a SWAT team to find Darla.

title: Tabula Rasa
plot: While trying to find a way to make Buffy forget about her afterlife experience, Willow inadvertently casts a spell that erases everyone's memories.

title: Lullaby
plot: As Darla goes through a difficult labor, Holtz pursues Angel.

title: Smashed
plot: Willow turns Amy the Rat into her old self; Jonathan, Warren and Andrew steal a diamond; and Spike discovers something unexpected about Buffy.

title: Wrecked
plot: Amy introduces Willow to a warlock whose powerful black magic proves addictive; Buffy and Spike deal with the aftermath of their night of passion.

title: Dad
plot: Angel tries to keep his son safe from the many demons, vampires and humans who wish him harm, and Holtz joins forces with another vampire slayer.

title: Gone
plot: The Three Geeks mistakenly turn Buffy invisible. The Slayer takes some advantage from going unseen. Willow has to do the detective without using magic, while Xander finds Spike doing some weird physical training.

title: Birthday
plot: Cordelia learns that her visions will kill her unless she goes back in time and chooses a different path in life--one that doesn't involve Angel.

title: Provider
plot: Fred solves a puzzle for a group of demons who want to buy her brain, and Angel is hired to clean out a vampire nest.

title: Doublemeat Palace
plot: When Buffy gets a job at the Doublemeat Palace, a local fast-food restaurant, she begins to believe that disappearing co-workers and the secret ingredient to the restaurant's hamburger may be connected.

title: Waiting in the Wings
plot: Angel and his friends attend a ballet, where Angel realizes he saw the exact same dancers on stage 110 years ago.

title: Dead Things
plot: After Jonathan, Andrew, and Warren accidentally kill Warren's ex-girlfriend Katrina, they set Buffy up to make her believe it was she who killed the girl.

title: Older and Far Away
plot: After Dawn talks to a guidance counselor about her feeling lonely, she accidentally puts a spell on Buffy and her friends, trapping them inside the Summer's house with a sword-wielding demon.

title: Couplet
plot: Angel struggles with his jealousy of the Groosalugg and Cordelia's attraction to him, while Gunn and Fred get captured by a tree monster.

title: Loyalty
plot: Wes dreads the fulfillment of the prophecy that Angel will kill Connor, and Sahjhan becomes dissatisfied with Holtz's progress in staking Angel.

title: As You Were
plot: Buffy's old boyfriend, Riley Finn, shows up unexpectedly as he tracks a demon about to hatch eggs that could wipe out Sunnydale.

title: Sleep Tight
plot: To save Connor's life, Wes takes him away from Angel; Angel uncovers Lilah's plot to have him kill Connor; Holtz finally attacks.

title: Hell's Bells
plot: Anya and Xander's wedding is thrown into turmoil when a man claiming to be Xander's future self turns up at the ceremony.

title: Normal Again
plot: After Buffy is stung by a demon, she begins to have vivid day-dreams about a mental asylum. She gradually begins to believe that she is a crazy girl back in L.A and that Sunnydale and all her friends are just a figment of her imagination.

title: Forgiving
plot: As Fred and Gunn search for Wesley, Angel searches for Sahjhan and casts a spell to make him corporeal so he can be killed.

title: Double or Nothing
plot: When a demon Gunn once sold his soul to comes to collect on the debt, Angel, Fred and Cordelia help to save him.

title: The Price
plot: Angel's hotel is infested by demonic slugs created by the spell he used to alter Sahjhan.

title: Entropy
plot: Anya returns to Sunnydale, bent on revenge for Xander leaving her at the altar. She has since become a Vengence demon again, but ends up hurting Xander in a way she never expected.

title: A New World
plot: Angel pursues Connor, who makes a new friend on the streets; something else comes through the portal from Quor-toth; Lilah approaches Wesley.

title: Seeing Red
plot: Willow and Tara wallow in their togetherness, but things aren't as happy everywhere else. Buffy has to face both Xander and Spike, whilst tracking Warren and Company to foil their next move.

title: Benediction
plot: Holtz insists that Connor rejoin Angel, Justine learns Holtz is back, and the Groosalugg realizes the depth of Cordelia's feelings for Angel.

title: Villains
plot: A vengeful Willow uses her enormous power to track down Warren, despite Buffy's strong feelings about targeting humans.

title: Tomorrow
plot: Connor returns to Angel to seek his revenge, and Angel and Cordelia acknowledge their feelings for each other.

title: Two to Go
plot: Fueled by black magic, Willow targets Andrew and Jonathan, leading to a battle between Buffy and Willow; Spike fights an unstoppable foe.

title: Grave
plot: After sucking all the energy out of Giles, a powerful Willow sets off to destroy the world.

title: Lessons
plot: Sunnydale High is re-opened, with a new designed campus and a new principal, Robin Wood. It is Dawn's first day at school there and Buffy accompanies her to class, only to discover evil spirits lurking in the basement.

title: Beneath You
plot: A giant worm-like creature begins stalking a young woman. As the gang begin to investigate, they realise it's appearance in Sunnydale may be linked to Anya.

title: Deep Down
plot: As Fred and Gunn search for Angel, Wesley continues his affair with Lilah and conducts his own, more fruitful search.

title: Same Time, Same Place
plot: Willow's return proves problematic when she is literally unable to see her friends--and is left with a creature that paralyzes its victims.

title: Ground State
plot: In his quest to steal an artifact that may help him find Cordelia, Angel competes with a human thief whose body is electrically charged.

title: Help
plot: Buffy begins a new job as school counsellor at Sunnydale High. On her first day she encounters a troubled young girl who is convinced she is about to die.

title: The House Always Wins
plot: Angel, Fred and Gunn discover that Lorne is being held prisoner in a corrupt Las Vegas casino.

title: Selfless
plot: Anya's violent and deadly act of vengeance leaves everyone stunned. Buffy must put aside her feelings and take action before more people die.

title: Slouching Toward Bethlehem
plot: Unable to remember her friends and scared by the world of demons and vampires, Cordelia takes refuge with Connor, who saves her from a demon attack.

title: Supersymmetry
plot: Fred discovers that her old physics professor is the one who exiled her to Pylea, and Cordelia begins to wonder about her history with Angel.

title: Him
plot: Xander and Spike search for the source of a spell that has bewitched the girls into competing for the affections of the high school quarterback.

title: Spin the Bottle
plot: Lorne's spell to restore Cordelia's memory makes everyone think they're high school students who have been gathered to hunt a vampire: Angel.

title: Conversations with Dead People
plot: Buffy strikes up a conversation with a vampire who was once an acquaintance in high school. Dawn defends Joyce from a menacing creature.

title: Apocalypse, Nowish
plot: As plagues of various pests descend on Los Angeles, the beast Cordelia saw in her vision returns--and the Apocalypse begins.

title: Sleeper
plot: Buffy and her friends fear Spike may be to blame when a number of people around town mysteriously disappear.

title: Never Leave Me
plot: Buffy hopes to learn more about what she's up against with the First by taking Spike prisoner; Xander and Anya interrogate Andrew.

title: Bring on the Night
plot: Giles returns to Sunnydale with three potential slayers, whom Buffy must protect from The First. Meanwhile, a ferocious Uber-vampire is released from the Hellmouth and Buffy must kill it before it kills one of the potentials.

title: Showtime
plot: Buffy has to keep the ever increasing number of potential Slayers from panicking while Giles and Anya seek answers from the Beljoxa's Eye.

title: Habeas Corpses
plot: Connor gets locked inside Wolfram and Hart with the big bad doomsday beast, who turns the legal firm's staff into an army of zombies.

title: Potential
plot: Buffy takes the Potentials to a demon bar and then to Spike's crypt, in order to teach them the art of slaying. When Willow casts a spell to seek out the next Potential, the spell leads them to believe that Dawn may be a future slayer.

title: Long Day's Journey
plot: After a group of totems linked to the ancient sun god Ra are killed by the big, bad Beast, Angel realizes he's plotting to turn off the sun.

title: Awakening
plot: Angel agrees to try to bring Angelus back, but after the first attempt fails, the group discovers a magic sword that might do a better job.

title: The Killer in Me
plot: After Willow and Kennedy share their first kiss, Willow is transformed into Warren, the man she killed last year. When she sets out to find help, she bumps into an old friend. Meanwhile, Buffy searches for answers when Spike's chip causes him great pain, and the gang suspect that Giles may really be The First

title: Soulless
plot: Cordelia offers Angelus a deal: if he tells what he knows about the Beast, she'll give herself to him.

title: First Date
plot: Buffy accepts an invitation to dinner from Principal Wood, and the secrets of his past are revealed. Xander impresses a beautiful girl with his knowledge of rope, and she seems to be interested in tying him up. Meanwhile, the First contacts Andrew in another attempt to destroy the Potentials, and Giles finds himself tongue-tied with the new Potential, Chao-Ahn.

title: Calvary
plot: After learning the doomsday Beast is working for something bigger and badder than itself, Angel's friends try to return his soul to Angelus's body.

title: Get It Done
plot: The Scoobies use a spell to transport Buffy into a shadow world, where she meets the men who created the first slayer. However, in order for her to return home, the gang must find and slay a ferocious demon

title: Storyteller
plot: Andrew creates a documentary called "Buffy, Slayer of the Vampyres", a record of the current situation in Sunnydale to show to future generations. He manages to capture many important moments, and to annoy almost everyone in the house. But Buffy needs to tear him away from his filmmaking because the Seal of Danzalthar is active and Andrew may hold the key to closing it before it destroys the town.

title: Salvage
plot: After releasing Faith from prison, Wesley takes her to Los Angeles hoping she will be able to trap Angelus. Faith finds Angelus and The Beast.

title: Release
plot: As Faith and Angel continue their battle, the voice of the Beast's master invades Angel's mind.

title: Orpheus
plot: Fred calls Willow to re-en soul Angel. She encounters unexpected resistance from a mysterious source. Faith's strategy to capture Angelus has an unexpected side affect. She enters Angel's mind and witnesses some of his past.

title: Lies My Parents Told Me
plot: Robin Wood seeks revenge on Spike for killing his mother nearly 30 years ago, whilst everyone else tries to find out how The First has control over him.

title: Players
plot: As Angel tries to remember what Lilah's book said about the Master, Lorne plans a cleansing ritual to regain his empathic powers.

title: Inside Out
plot: As Cordelia prepares to give birth, Angel and his friends finally learn that she--or an evil presence controlling her--is the Beast's master.

title: Shiny Happy People
plot: While everyone else worships the beautiful woman Cordelia bore, Fred sees another side of her.

title: Dirty Girls
plot: Faith returns to Sunnydale just as a new villain, Caleb, arrives and sends Buffy a message in the form of a badly beaten Potential. Buffy leads the rest of the girls to Caleb and The First's lair, with devastating consequences.

title: The Magic Bullet
plot: As Jasmine's influence continues to spread, Fred finally tricks Angel into seeing her true nature.

title: Sacrifice
plot: Hiding out in a sewer, Angel and his friends fight a nasty monster who provides some clues that could help them in their battle against Jasmine.

title: Empty Places
plot: After their horrifying loss at the vineyard, the gang turn against Buffy and begin to follow Faith instead. Meanwhile, Spike and Andrew travel to an old church to question a priest about Caleb.

title: Peace Out
plot: Angel returns from the monster's dimension and finally defuses Jasmine's all-encompassing power.

title: Touched
plot: Faith and the Potentials search underground for a weapon, whilst Buffy confronts Caleb at the vineyard.

title: Home
plot: Lilah returns from the dead to offer Angel and his friends full ownership of Wolfram and Hart.

title: End of Days
plot: Buffy has a powerful new weapon, but the gang cannot find any information about the origins of the mysterious scythe. Eventually the Slayer goes herself in search of knowledge, and finds a new ally, an old friend, and great danger.

title: Chosen
plot: After killing Caleb, Buffy conceives a plan to defeat the First once and for all. Willow invokes a magic spell that alters the ancient Slayer spell and gives Buffy the allies she needs to fight the Uber-Vamp army. An epic battle ensues and several good friends are lost. At the end, Buffy faces a completely new problem -- one she's glad to have.

title: Conviction
plot: Angel and the gang adjust to life at Wolfram & Hart, while Angel lets loose the shocking contents of a package from Sunnydale.

title: Just Rewards
plot: Angel and Spike challenge a necromancer who is unhappy with Wolfram and Hart's new leadership.

title: Unleashed
plot: Angel saves a woman from a werewolf attack, but not before the woman was bitten. Now she will become a werewolf. As Team Angel tries to help her cope with her new situation, someone else would like to have Werewolf for dinner.

title: Hell-Bound
plot: Fred faces technical and budgetary setbacks in her project to make Spike corporeal. Meanwhile, Spike is beset by grisly apparitions that only he can see.

title: Life of the Party
plot: When Lorne gets his sleep removed to prepare for the firm's Halloween Party, he doesn't realize the consequences. At the party, everyone has to do what he tells them to do, but mystically. In the end, Spike is thinking positively, Gunn is "marking his territory", Angel and Eve get a room, and Wes and Fred are drunk. They all have to get Lorne to sleep before...well, watch the episode.

title: The Cautionary Tale of Numero Cinco
plot: It turns out that the Wolfram & Hart mail guy is more than he seems. He and his brothers were once demon fighters. But, when he lost his family in battle, he gave up on being a Champion. When one of his old foes comes to town, though, he has to help Team Angel defeat it.

title: Lineage
plot: Wesley's father comes for a visit. With his father overseeing and critiquing everything he does, his old feelings of insecurity arise. Also, Wolfram and Hart is besieged by robot ninjas.

title: Destiny
plot: Spike receives a mysterious box of "flashy" in the mail and is shocked when it somehow recorporealizes him. He's thrilled to be solid again, but when odd things start happening at Wolfram & Hart, Eve says that they now have a problem. With Spike an un-ghosted Vampire Champion, the Shanshu Prophesy could also apply to him. Spike & Angel have to try and figure out which one of them is destined to become human again.

title: Harm's Way
plot: Harmony is having trouble adjusting to working for Angel. The other employees of Wolfram & Hart ignore her and she's feeling depressed about her life. After a night out with Fred, though, Harm's troubles are about to get a lot more serious.

title: Soul Purpose
plot: Lindsey and Eve continue to plot against Team Angel. Lindsey approaches Spike, telling him that the Powers That Be have selected Spike to be the new Champion now that Angel is working for Wolfram & Hart. Meanwhile, Angel is caught in a series of hallucinations and can't wake up.

title: Damage
plot: A psychotic vampire slayer has escaped from her asylum, and is now on the loose in Los Angeles. Angel and Spike are on the hunt for her, before she does more damage. Once she is found, looking for pieces of her past, she believes that Spike was the man who drove her towards insanity, and wants to seek revenge.

title: You're Welcome
plot: Cordelia awakens from her magically induced coma and returns to help Angel fight an old enemy who has reappeared even more powerful than ever.

title: Why We Fight
plot: Angel's past comes to haunt him. An ally from World War II takes Fred, Gunn, and Wes hostage while seeking Angel. This is the only vampire Angel sired after he got his soul back. Angel relives the past and must determine his future.

title: Smile Time
plot: Angel and the gang set out to foil an evil puppet show that is sucking the brain power of all the children who watch. During their fight, Angel is turned into a puppet himself and must rely upon his friends in order to reverse the spell which holds him at one foot tall.

title: A Hole in the World
plot: When an ancient sarcophagus arrives in the laboratory at Wolfram & Hart, Fred opens a small compartment and is infected by an ancient disease that slowly begins to kill her. As Angel and Spike travel across the world in order to help her, Wesley slowly begins to realize that there may be no stopping this disease.

title: Shells
plot: As Angel and the gang try desperately to bring Fred back, Wesley begins to understand that the ancient demon Illyria, now fused with Fred's body, is here to stay. Exhausting all options for saving Fred, the gang switches gears to stop Illyria and her plan for global domination.

title: Underneath
plot: Angel, Spike and Gunn travel to a surprisingly unusual hell dimension to free Lindsey and find out what he knows of the Senior Partners' ultimate plans. With Illyria's army defunct and her plans averted, the gang accepts her as a dubious ally. Wesley, volunteering to be her guide and mentor, falls slowly into depression and self-destruction. Meanwhile, the Senior Partners send a new, unstoppable force, a new liaison and businessman, named Marcus Hamilton, to find Eve, and Gunn makes an important decision in an attempt to protect his friends... and save his soul.

title: Origin
plot: Parents bring their son to Wolfram and Hart to try to make sense of their son's superhuman abilities. Team Angel wants their assistance, but Angel refuses, because it's his son Connor. A demon is after Connor, but without his memories of his old life, he doesn't have much of a chance against the demon. True memories are revealed for Connor and a member of Team Angel

title: Time Bomb
plot: Illyria begins acting more strangely than usual. After she rescues Gunn from the suburban hell dimension, she begins displaying more power. After a hint from Hamilton, Wesley discovers that Fred's body is insufficient to contain Illyria's power, and she is about to explode. Meanwhile, Angel discovers that she is unintentionally leapfrogging through time, and uses it as possibly the only way to stop her. Also, Gunn begins to have suspicions about Angel being corrupted when he allows a demonic brethren to accept a pregnant young woman's baby as an upcoming sacrificial ...

title: The Girl in Question
plot: Angel and Spike's mission to help resurrect a demon gang leader in Italy is made more complicated when they learn that their former love, Buffy, might be in danger. Meanwhile, when the Burkles make a surprise visit to Wolfram & Hart, Illyria solves the problem by showing Wesley a frightening talent- a talent that challenges his own moral standing.

title: Power Play
plot: The Team have reason to believe that Angel has been utterly corrupted with power when they find evidence that he has joined the Circle of the Black Thorn, the most evil of secret societies. Wesley, Gunn, Spike, and even Illyria discover some surprises when they urge Angel to side with the forces of Good again.

title: Not Fade Away
plot: In the series finale, Angel reveals that his questionable moral behavior has been part of a bigger plan: to destroy The Circle of the Black Thorn and show the Senior Partners that the power of good can still make a difference. Wesley struggles with helping Illyria adapt to the world, scolding her for her attempts to take on Fred's form. As Gunn continues his quest of self-discovery, Lorne becomes more aware of the lack of happiness in the world. Harmony attempts to seduce Marcus Hamilton for information, Lindsey makes an important decision regarding his alliance, and ...
